statements: SELECT * FROM water_samples;
SELECT source_name, pollution_level FROM water_samples;
SELECT * FROM water_samples WHERE pollution_level > 4.0;
SELECT source_name FROM water_samples ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) FROM water_samples;
SELECT * FROM water_samples WHERE pollution_level > 5 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, source_name FROM water_samples WHERE pollution_level < 2 AND source_name LIKE 'River%' ORDER BY pollution_level ASC;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution, COUNT(sample_id) AS total_samples FROM water_samples WHERE source_name = 'Lake' GROUP BY source_name;
SELECT sample_id, source_name, pollution_level FROM water_samples WHERE sample_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) OR source_name = 'Ocean';
SELECT source_name, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution FROM water_samples GROUP BY source_name HAVING max_pollution > 7 ORDER BY max_pollution DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSamples;
SELECT sample_id, chemical_name FROM WaterSamples WHERE concentration > 10;
SELECT source_name, location FROM PollutionSources WHERE pollution_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM WaterSamples WHERE chemical_name = 'Lead';
SELECT sample_id, concentration FROM WaterSamples WHERE concentration BETWEEN 5 AND 8;
SELECT * FROM WaterSamples WHERE concentration > 10 ORDER BY sample_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT chemical_name, concentration FROM WaterSamples WHERE source_id = 3 ORDER BY concentration ASC;
SELECT sample_id, chemical_name, concentration FROM WaterSamples JOIN PollutionSources ON WaterSamples.source_id = PollutionSources.source_id WHERE PollutionSources.pollution_level > 5.0;
SELECT source_name, location, pollution_level FROM PollutionSources WHERE source_name LIKE 'Factory%' ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSamples WHERE concentration BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY sample_id ASC, concentration DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_samples;
SELECT pollutant_name, collection_date FROM water_samples WHERE pollutant_level > 5.0;
SELECT source_name, location FROM pollution_sources WHERE type = 'industrial';
SELECT id, pollutant_name, pollutant_level, collection_date FROM water_samples WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_details;
SELECT id, pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM water_samples;
SELECT * FROM water_samples WHERE pollutant_level > 5;
SELECT source_id, source_name, location FROM pollution_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_details WHERE longitude < -70 ORDER BY latitude ASC;
SELECT w.id, w.pollutant_name, p.location FROM water_samples w JOIN pollution_sources p ON w.source_id = p.source_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterSamples;
SELECT source_id, date_collected, pH FROM WaterSamples WHERE pH > 7;
SELECT source_id, location FROM PollutionSources WHERE pollution_level > 0.5;
SELECT type_name, description FROM PollutionTypes;
SELECT sample_id, chemical_name, concentration FROM ChemicalComposition WHERE concentration >= 10;
SELECT * FROM WaterSamples ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT source_name, pollution_level FROM PollutionSources WHERE pollution_level > 0.5;
SELECT chemical_name, concentration, units FROM ChemicalComposition WHERE sample_id = 1001 AND concentration > 10;
SELECT * FROM PollutionTypes WHERE type_name LIKE 'Chemical%';
SELECT source_name, location FROM PollutionSources JOIN WaterSamples ON PollutionSources.source_id = WaterSamples.source_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterSamples;
SELECT source_name, sample_date FROM WaterSamples WHERE pH > 7;
SELECT source_name, location FROM PollutionSources ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT scientist_name, email FROM ResearchScientists WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY experience_years ASC;
SELECT sample_date, chemical_name, concentration FROM ChemicalAnalysis WHERE concentration BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT * FROM WaterSamples WHERE pH > 7.0;
SELECT source_name, sample_date, salinity FROM WaterSamples WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT source_name, location FROM PollutionSources WHERE pollution_type = 'Chemical';
SELECT scientist_name, email FROM ResearchScientists WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY scientist_name DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, chemical_name, concentration FROM ChemicalAnalysis ORDER BY concentration DESC;
